AI Description: R is a programming language and software environment designed specifically for statistical computing and graphics. It provides a wide variety of statistical and graphical techniques, including linear and nonlinear modeling, time-series analysis, classification, clustering, and more.
Core Features: Core features of R include a large collection of packages for data manipulation, calculation, and visualization; a diverse range of statistical functions for hypothesis testing and modeling; an active and vibrant community for support and development; seamless integration with other data sources and databases.
General Tags: Statistical Computing, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
